meanings.definition: A bulbous plant of the lily family, with straplike leaves and a compact spike of bell-shaped fragrant flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the hyacinth bloomed beautifully under the sun.
meanings.sent2: The sweet scent of the hyacinth filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn in the hyacinth pot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a hyacinth, spreading joy wherever it went.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant purple hyacinth stood out among the green foliage.
